item.title: Luke Addison
item.author: lukeaddison785@gmail.com (Luke Addison)
item.description:
I work at HSBC as a Kubernetes platform engineer leading a small team helping to abstract away complexity from application teams.

I am passionate about learning how to live a happy and peaceful life.
